attributes.action: Prioritise retail workers for the COVID-19 vaccine.
attributes.background: I want the government/parliament to consider that retail workers have worked through this whole pandemic. We haven’t had much thanks, we haven’t had anything extra. We see hundreds of people every single day so we deserve to be a priority. We’re only key workers when it suits.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
